nodes.text: The 3rd Wing Guard was a cloud car squadron assigned to the Bespin Wing Guard—a security force working to protect the Imperial garrisoned Cloud City.

When Darth Vader brought an occupation force to Cloud City, resistance against Imperial forces resulted in the reorganization of the 2nd Wing Guard squadron into a security force not obviously aligned with the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
The 3rd Wing Guard served Cloud City's Bespin Wing Guard after Calrissian's departure, protecting it even under and in spite of the occupation of an Imperial garrison.
Based in Cloud City Security Tower on Bespin's Cloud City, the 3rd Wing Guard's cloud cars were painted orange and offered minimal protection to the pilots who flew them.
The 3rd Wing Guard was represented by a miniature in the Scum & Villainy expansion of the Star Wars PocketModel TCG.
